InspectionModelQuestion.Text: Black disc (150 mm in diameter) on white background affixed to bottom of pool at its deepest point
Sufficient supply of chemicals and testing devices
Every bather shall take a cleansing shower/bath using soap and warm water before entering deck
Gas chlorine (Cl) handled properly, safety equipment present and chlorinating equipment operational
Emergency telephone sign posted with complete list of emergency contacts
Toilets supplied with toilet paper
Stabilized free available chlorine (FAC) at a minimum of 1.0mg/L (1.0ppm) when used with cyanurate stabilization;
Premises is maintained free from every condition that may be a health hazard
Shower signs posted at each shower and every entrance to the deck used by bathers
Shallow Water/No Diving Caution (pool water depth < 2.5 m)
An adjustable dosing device is used to administer chlorine, a chlorine compound or a bromine compound
Other records signed and completed
Safety equipment available and in good repair
Diving platform 3 m or greater - pool used solely for diving unless rigid barrier/double safety lines 300 mm apart supported by buoys in place
Pool ramp notices posted in letters not less than 150 mm high (pools with one or more ramps)
Pool deck is clearly delineated from the general area
pH is within range of 7.2 to 7.8
Correct number of control stations present (Class A Pool Only)
Total alkalinity at a minimum of 80mg/L (80ppm);
Water facility inaccessible when closed
Cyanuric acid is not greater than 60mg/L (60ppm)
Records retained for one year
Pool, deck, sanitary facility and adjoining areas kept in safe and sanitary condition
No food or beverage except for water is supplied/consumed within water facility
Safety supervision requirements met
Modified pool requirements met
Recirculation system of water facility is in good working condition
Equalizer fittings rendered inoperable
Water meter registers the volume of make-up water
Locked gate preventing access to diving platform 3 m or greater when not in use
Exposed piping within pool enclosure is properly colour-coded;
Water clarity satisfactory/black disk clearly visible 9 m away
Control station requirements met
Deck and walls maintained in a sanitary condition and free from hazards
Water is maintained free from visible matter and contamination
Manual testing conducted once a day for pools with automatic sensing devices (pH, FAC and Total Cl or Br only);
Foot sprays are maintained in good working order and kept sanitary
Perimeter pool drain is kept free from debris
Safe storage and handling of all chemicals
Emergency telephone is present and operational
Ramp signage and barriers provided
Continuous operation of all equipment and chemical feeders
Depth markings present in appropriate locations
Written emergency, and operational procedures & instructions available at the pool
Moveable equipment (i.e. portable diving stands, starting platforms, swing ropes) on deck only when in use under supervision
Free available chlorine (FAC) at a minimum of 0.5mg/L (0.5ppm);
Diving board or diving platform has non-slip surface finish
Daily records completed and signed
"Pool Rules" notices displayed with complete information
Total bromine (Br) residual at a minimum of 2mg/L (2.0ppm);

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: d93c2728-c7b3-4008-842b-03a4f742853e
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure black disc is located at the deepest point

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure proper operation of gas chlorinator

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure notice is posted identifying the emergency telephone

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure a list of emergency contacts with telephone numbers is posted

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Supply toilet paper

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 14a444b0-22ef-4718-b930-2ef1a3fb320d

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Maintain FAC at a minimum of 1.0mg/L (1.0ppm)

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure shower signs are posted at every entrance to the deck used by bathers

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: eafbc006-ba22-43eb-a98e-35d554eaa874
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure correct wording of the signs are as follows: "Each bather shall take a shower using warm water and soap and thoroughly rinse off all soap before entering/re-entering the deck"

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure shower signs are posted at each shower area

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: bd64fd35-7b01-4b71-befc-3c907bebef46
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the words "CAUTION - AVOID DEEP DIVES" OR "SHALLOW WATER - NO DIVING" are in letters not less than 150 mm high

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the words "CAUTION - AVOID DEEP DIVES" or "SHALLOW WATER - NO DIVING" are posted

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: bd64fd35-7b01-4b71-befc-3c907bebef46
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the words "CAUTION - AVOID DEEP DIVES" or "SHALLOW WATER - NO DIVING" are located in a conspicuous location

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide an adjustable dosing device

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: fb181e67-036b-4db1-b490-3cd875447780
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure water outlet covers are inspected and recorded (at least once every 30 operating days) along with time of day test was completed

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: fb181e67-036b-4db1-b490-3cd875447780
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure cyanurate stabilization is determined (at least 1/week)

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least a current copy of the St John Ambulance or the Canadian Red Cross Society First Aid Manual

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: CLOSE POOL

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least six triangular bandages

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least two rolls of splint padding

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide an electrically insulated non-conducting reaching pole at least 3.65m long

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least four rolls of 100 millimetre gauze bandage

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide two buoyant throwing aids with rope (6mm in diameter, 1/2 width of pool plus 3m)

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a spine board

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least twelve safety pins

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least twelve sterile gauze pads, each seventy-five millimetres square

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure all safety equipment is maintained in good repair

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least twenty-four adhesive dressings individually wrapped

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide all safety equipment in places conveniently located for emergency use

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least four sterile surgical pads suitable for pressure dressings individually wrapped

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least one roll-up splint

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: a34c573c-f31f-45aa-b36d-42a264ea8215
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide a first-aid box with at least four rolls of fifty millimetre gauze bandage

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Maintain total alkalinity at a minimum of 80mg/L (80ppm)

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83742d92-f0c2-46b5-a90e-6fa0dfe36e89
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure that records are kept for one year from the date of making the record

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2e76de66-da48-42cb-b28b-74183e96dbc7
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Clean and disinfect pool and deck areas and ensure they are free from slipperiness

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2e76de66-da48-42cb-b28b-74183e96dbc7
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Clean and disinfect the change rooms, toilets, showers, and connecting corridor and ensure they are free from slipperiness

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2e76de66-da48-42cb-b28b-74183e96dbc7
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Maintain ventilation in pool and deck area so as to remove odours

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2e76de66-da48-42cb-b28b-74183e96dbc7
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Maintain pool and deck free from hazardous obstructions

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2e76de66-da48-42cb-b28b-74183e96dbc7
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Maintain the change rooms, toilets, showers and connecting corridor ventilated so as to remove odours

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2e76de66-da48-42cb-b28b-74183e96dbc7
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Maintain the change rooms, toilets, showers and connecting corridor free from hazardous obstructions

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 7b55492c-3bee-4ef0-86bb-747867062006
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure no food or beverage is supplied/consumed in the water facility

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 7b55492c-3bee-4ef0-86bb-747867062006
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure glass containers are not brought onto the deck or in to the water facility

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure all lifeguards and assistant lifeguards are readily identifiable by attire

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the minimum number of qualified lifeguards and assistant lifeguards are on duty

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure that a day care or a day camp pool facility (depth of >1.10 metres) has a qualified lifeguard or assistant lifeguard on duty

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure copies of lifeguard and assistant lifeguard certificates are readily available at the pool

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: CLOSE POOL

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure that a day care or day camp pool facility (depth <1.10 metres) is supervised by a competent swimmer, sixteen years of age or older, trained in emergency procedures and certified in first-aid

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the number of lifeguards is greater than the number of assistant lifeguards on duty

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure at least one staff on duty is a qualified lifeguard or is at least 16 years of age and holds a current first-aid certificate

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 41225d46-6f42-42a5-8e0b-74e75cff3924
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure lifeguards and assistant lifeguards hold the minimum qualifications

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Repair or replace gate to ensure it is in good working condition

InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure exposed piping is painted or colour-coded with bands at least 25mm wide, at intervals no greater than 1.2 m (chlorine - yellow, potable water - green)

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: f9cab7a2-fba1-41dd-aab2-e371117eed88
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure figures are marked not less than 100 mm high

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: f9cab7a2-fba1-41dd-aab2-e371117eed88
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide markings that indicate "DEEP AREA"

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: f9cab7a2-fba1-41dd-aab2-e371117eed88
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide markings that indicate breaks between gentle and steep bottom slopes

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: f9cab7a2-fba1-41dd-aab2-e371117eed88
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide markings that indicate deep points

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: f9cab7a2-fba1-41dd-aab2-e371117eed88
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Provide markings that indicate "SHALLOW AREA"

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 5612946a-fd3c-44a0-9d7f-eaa00b2fb0fd
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure that written emergency, and operational procedures & instructions are available, and lifeguards are trained in these procedures

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 99f9d2b8-e9fb-4e8b-9933-efc05bddb5fd
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure that the equipment is in place on the deck only during periods when its use is directly supervised by aquatic personnel

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 34c5ac10-cdbf-49d9-852a-f2be074cf7a7
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: CLOSE POOL

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 34c5ac10-cdbf-49d9-852a-f2be074cf7a7
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Maintain FAC at a minimum of 0.5mg/L (0.5ppm)

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2c474632-9018-4b85-9b02-f93465792a68
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the diving board/diving platform has a non-slip surface finish

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Record any emergencies, rescues, or breakdown of equipment that have occurred

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Complete and sign records daily

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Record time of day for testing of emergency telephone

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Record pH 1/2 hour before opening & every 2 hours while pool is open

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Record Br residual 1/2 hour before opening & every 2 hours while pool is open

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Record reading of the make-up water meter

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Record total number of bathers admitted to pool each day

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Record time of day for testing of ground fault detector

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 83ad0294-8bf1-471e-a18a-fc50146e1e7d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Record Cl (free and total) residual 1/2 hour before opening & every 2 hours while pool is open

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: ae45793a-1423-45e2-ab38-fd24ab4e7b9d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the correct wording of the "Pool Rules" notices includes "that no person shall engage in boisterous play in or about the pool"

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: ae45793a-1423-45e2-ab38-fd24ab4e7b9d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the correct wording of the "Pool Rules" notices includes "that no person shall pollute the water in the pool in any manner and that spitting, spouting of water and blowing the nose in the pool or on the deck are prohibited"

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: ae45793a-1423-45e2-ab38-fd24ab4e7b9d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the correct wording of the "Pool Rules" notices includes "that no person shall bring a glass container onto the deck or into the pool"

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: ae45793a-1423-45e2-ab38-fd24ab4e7b9d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure at least two "Pool Rules" notices are displayed

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: ae45793a-1423-45e2-ab38-fd24ab4e7b9d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the maximum number of bathers is indicated on the "Pool Rules" notices

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: ae45793a-1423-45e2-ab38-fd24ab4e7b9d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the correct wording of the "Pool Rules" notices includes "that no person infected with a communicable disease or having open sores on his or her body shall enter the pool"

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: ae45793a-1423-45e2-ab38-fd24ab4e7b9d
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Ensure the location of the emergency telephone is indicated on the "Pool Rules" notices

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2fcd6de8-1343-4fcf-8b2d-fd79339cb0ec
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: CLOSE POOL

InspectionModelCannedComment.Question: 2fcd6de8-1343-4fcf-8b2d-fd79339cb0ec
InspectionModelCannedComment.Description: Maintain total bromine residual at a minimum of 2mg/L (2.0ppm)
